document_data.mainbody:
Burrath was the bodyguard of Lord Olgarth Oldbridle in the late 15 century DR.
He protected Olgarth Oldbridle as a bodyguard.
For whatever reason, Andranth Glarvreth believed Burrath should recognize Kormoroth.
While being mind-ridden by the evil vampire archmage Manshoon in late Mirtul of the  during the lead-up to the Council of the Dragon, Burrath guarded Lord Oldbridle during a dinner with a would-be noble and merchant, Andranth Glarvreth. Through him, Manshoon lied that there had been men following Lord Oldbridle in the street, which made Glarvreths guards leave to hunt them down.
Unfortunatelym, several men burst through the windows moments later, and the unguarded Lord Oldbridle was slain, while Andranth Glarvreth escaped down a secret passage. Burrath was able to slay his Lords murderer before following Glarvreth down the passageway there, Glarvreth told him that the man with a grudge against he himself was Kormoroth, whom Burrath had just slain. He then dropped a portcullis, barring Burrath from accompanying him the bodyguard took a different path out the house.
He then went to Immaero Sraunters property, where he was drugged and slept on the mans bed, all on Manshoons instructions.
